description:
If you were injured or you have lost a loved one in an accident caused by the negligence of another individual, contact a Forked River, New Jersey, personal injury lawyer. At Levinson Axelrod, P.A., we have 75 years of experience guiding injured clients through the legal process of monetary recovery.

We offer 100 percent FREE case evaluations to help determine if you have sufficient grounds to file a lawsuit, and we only get paid if we win your case.

Following a serious accident, an individual can suffer catastrophic injuries such as head trauma, neck sprains or spinal cord damage. The severity of the injury can lead to extended hospital stays, multiple surgeries or lengthy physical therapy. The attorneys at Levinson Axelrod, P.A., will fight to recover the maximum monetary recovery possible in your situation for lost wages, medical bills, and pain and suffering.

Celebrating 80 years of practice.

Our law firm is well-equipped to handle the full range of personal injury cases, including:

  • Motor vehicle accidents, including car accidents, truck accidents and motorcycle accidents
  • Dog bites
  • Faulty pharmaceutical products
  • Medical malpractice
  • Premises liability
  • Product liability
  • Workers' compensation
  • Wrongful death

Contact our law firm to schedule a free consultation and receive an honest case evaluation. We maintain seven area offices for the convenience of our clients.
